fields.name: Post Unique Reference
fields.description: Unique id for a post. Individuals not in a post must have Post Unique Reference 0 (zero). Must be unique in the organization, unless it is '0' or the line is duplicate save for name, contact phone/email and notes, meaning it is a job share. Allowed chars 'A-Za-z-'

fields.name: Name
fields.description: Name of person in role, or 'N/D' if the role is not disclosed, or 'Vacant' if not currently filled, or 'Eliminated' if the role was reported in the last period but no longer exists. Cannot be N/D if the pay is a number.

fields.name: Grade (or equivalent)
fields.description: Grade of role. Grades for senior civil servants are overseen by the Cabinet Office centrally. Valid values: SCS4, SCS3, SCS2, SCS1A, SCS1, OF-9, OF-8, OF-7, OF-6

fields.name: Job Title
fields.description: . Where Post Unique Reference is 0 write 'Not in Post'.

fields.name: Job/Team Function
fields.description: Free text. Maximum 100 words. Cannot be left blank.

fields.name: Parent Department
fields.description: Name of the central government department that oversees the organisation (or if the organisation is a department, just name it again here).

fields.name: Organisation
fields.description: The department or agency for whom the role is for. Non-abbreviated. 'N/A' only allowed when the Post Unique Reference is 0. Cannot be 'N/D'.

fields.name: Unit
fields.description: Where the organisation's staff are split into functional units (or teams/sections etc), give the name of the unit.

fields.name: Contact Phone
fields.description: If name is not disclosed, provide team details. If Post Unique Reference is 0, put 'N/A'.

fields.name: Contact E-mail
fields.description: If name is not disclosed, provide team details. If Post Unique Reference is 0, put 'N/A'.

constraints.description: The 'Post Unique Reference' of the post that this one reports to. The most senior post should put 'XX'. Cannot be left blank.

fields.name: Salary Cost of Reports (£)
fields.description: Postitive or zero number. Cannot be left blank - if none write 0.

fields.name: FTE
fields.description: Full Time Equivalent. If this is a full time role then put '1'. Otherwise put a decimal fraction with 2 decimal places.

fields.name: Actual Pay Floor (£)
fields.description: The annual pay, rounded down to the nearest multiple of £5,000. Can be 'N/A'. Cannot be left blank - if none write 0.

fields.name: Actual Pay Ceiling (£)
fields.description: The annual pay, rounded up to the nearest multiple of £5,000 minus 1.

fields.name: Professional/Occupational Group
fields.description: Allowed values: Communications, Economics, Finance, Human Resources, Information Technology, Internal Audit, Knowledge and Information Management (KIM), Law, Medicine, Military, Operational Delivery, Operational Research, Other, Planning, Policy, Procurement, Programme and Project Management (PPM), Property and asset management, Psychology, Science and Engineering, Social Research, Statisticians, Tax Professionals, Vets

fields.name: Notes
fields.description: Free text. Can be left blank.

fields.name: Valid?
fields.description: This is merely a hangover from the source spreadsheet's validation column. Blank and meaningless.
